# external/gpl3 Directory Architecture

## Overview
This document summarizes the top-level, git-tracked contents of `external/gpl3`.

## Top-level entries
### Directories (2)
- `binutils/`
- `gcc/`

### Files (3)
- `Makefile`
- `README`
- `arch.md`

## Notes
- Entries listed are tracked in git; untracked and ignored files are omitted.
- Log files (`*.log` and `*.log.*`) and `_tmp` directories are intentionally excluded.
- VCS metadata directories (.git, .hg, .svn, .bzr) are omitted.
